about_the_game:
In "Hentai Party on Rooftop," dive into an adventure filled with discoveries and intimate encounters. Assume the role of Mina, a young woman in search of mischief. Your goal is to reach the rooftop of a mysterious building where a legendary party known as the Hentai Party takes place.
On her way to the top, Mina meets four HOT characters, each one hornier than the other. Each encounter is an opportunity to fuck in a different way.
Precise, challenging platform game in which you will need to jump to the top of the apartment.

Features

-Accurate platformer with over 20 challenging floors
-20 Achievement available to show your skills.
-One-handed mode
-4 sexual partners and a big hentai party at the end
-Gallery mode, review hot moments with your friends, as many times as you want
-Censorable Mode, it is possible to activate censorship to enjoy just the challenge or even stream the game.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains content not appropriate for all ages, or for viewing at work: sexual content and nudity. The game graphically depicts sex. All characters in the game are over the age of 18.

On her way to the top, Mina meets four HOT characters, each one hornier than the other. Each encounter is an opportunity to fuck in a different way.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Steam OS
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core Processor with 2 GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics 4400 or better video card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Steam OS
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 GTS / Radeon HD 5750 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Hentai Party on Rooftop

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core Processor with 2 GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics 4400 or better video card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 GTS / Radeon HD 5750 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: In "Hentai Party on Rooftop," join Mina in a quest for erotic adventures at a legendary party. Encounter four hot characters along the way for unique sexual experiences.
